languages.text: {n}Данрок издает веселый смешок.{/n} "Позвольте выразить догадку, Ваша Светлость: госпожу канцлера поразила столь необычная щедрость от человека, который высказывает определенные... сомнения в касте Вольных Торговцев. Похоже, вам удалось произвести на старого скрягу впечатление".

traits.locale_text: {n}Данрок издает веселый смешок.{/n} "Позвольте выразить догадку, Ваша Светлость: госпожу канцлера поразила столь необычная щедрость от человека, который высказывает определенные... сомнения в касте Вольных Торговцев. Похоже, вам удалось произвести на старого скрягу впечатление".
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Danrok lets out an amused chuckle.{/n} "If I am to venture a guess, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I believe the esteemed chancellor was staggered by such an irregular display of generosity from a man who is rather known for voicing his... doubts in Rogue Traders as a class. It would seem you have made quite an impression on Macharius, the old miser."
languages.original_text: {n}Данрок издает веселый смешок.{/n} "Позвольте выразить догадку, Ваша Светлость: госпожу канцлера поразила столь необычная щедрость от человека, который высказывает определенные... сомнения в касте Вольных Торговцев. Похоже, вам удалось произвести на старого скрягу впечатление".

It would seem you have made quite an impression on Macharius, the old miser."

It would seem you have made quite an impression on Macharius, the old miser."

languages.text: {n}Danrok laisse échapper un petit rire.{/n} « Si j'osais me risquer à une supposition, Votre Seigneurie, je dirais que l'honorable chancelière a été abasourdie par une telle démonstration de générosité de la part d'un homme connu pour exprimer ses... doutes quant à la classe des libre-marchands. Il semblerait que vous ayez fait forte impression sur Macharius, ce vieil avare. »
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok lets out an amused chuckle.{/n} "If I am to venture a guess, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I believe the esteemed chancellor was staggered by such an irregular display of generosity from a man who is rather known for voicing his... doubts in Rogue Traders as a class. It would seem you have made quite an impression on Macharius, the old miser."

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok laisse échapper un petit rire.{/n} « Si j'osais me risquer à une supposition, Votre Seigneurie, je dirais que l'honorable chancelière a été abasourdie par une telle démonstration de générosité de la part d'un homme connu pour exprimer ses... doutes quant à la caste des libre-marchands. Il semblerait que vous ayez fait forte impression sur Macharius, ce vieil avare. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}丹罗克轻笑一声，似乎觉得很有趣。{/n}“如果要我大胆猜测的话，大人，马卡里乌斯大人素来以……对行商浪人桀骜不驯的态度闻名。至于这位尊贵的大人为什么会一反常态如此慷慨，我猜想，应该是您给马卡里乌斯那个老吝啬鬼留下了深刻的印象。”
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok lets out an amused chuckle.{/n} "If I am to venture a guess, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I believe the esteemed chancellor was staggered by such an irregular display of generosity from a man who is rather known for voicing his... doubts in Rogue Traders as a class. It would seem you have made quite an impression on Macharius, the old miser."

traits.locale_text: {n}丹罗克轻笑一声，似乎觉得很有趣。{/n}“如果要我大胆猜测的话，大人，马卡里乌斯大人素来以……对行商浪人桀骜不驯的态度闻名。至于这位尊贵的大人为什么会一反常态如此慷慨，我猜想，应该是您给马卡里乌斯那个老吝啬鬼留下了深刻的印象。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}ダンロックは楽しげな笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「陛下。私が思いますに、かの名高き法官は、自由開拓者を階級として認めぬことで知られる男ゆえ、このような想定外の寛大さが示されたことに驚いたのでしょう。あなたはあの老いぼれ守銭奴のマハリウスに、強烈な印象を与えたようですな」
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok lets out an amused chuckle.{/n} "If I am to venture a guess, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I believe the esteemed chancellor was staggered by such an irregular display of generosity from a man who is rather known for voicing his... doubts in Rogue Traders as a class. It would seem you have made quite an impression on Macharius, the old miser."

traits.locale_text: {n}ダンロックは楽しげな笑いを浮かべた。{/n}「陛下。私が思いますに、かの名高き法官は、自由開拓者を階級として認めぬことで知られる男ゆえ、このような想定外の寛大さが示されたことに驚いたのでしょう。あなたはあの老いぼれ守銭奴のマハリウスに、強烈な印象を与えたようですな」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Danrok kichert vergnügt. {/n} "Wenn ich eine Vermutung äußern darf, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich glaube, dass die geschätzte Kanzlerin geradezu verblüfft war ob der unregelmäßigen Geste der Großzügigkeit von einem Mann, der eher für seine ... Zweifel an der Klasse der Freihändler bekannt ist. Anscheinend habt Ihr bei dem alten Knauser Macharius ganz schön Eindruck hinterlassen."
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok lets out an amused chuckle.{/n} "If I am to venture a guess, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I believe the esteemed chancellor was staggered by such an irregular display of generosity from a man who is rather known for voicing his... doubts in Rogue Traders as a class. It would seem you have made quite an impression on Macharius, the old miser."

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok kichert vergnügt.{/n} "Wenn ich eine Vermutung äußern darf, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich glaube, dass die geschätzte Kanzlerin geradezu verblüfft war ob der unregelmäßigen Geste der Großzügigkeit von einem Mann, der eher für seine ... Zweifel an der Kaste der Freihändler bekannt ist. Anscheinend habt Ihr bei dem alten Knauser Macharius ganz schön Eindruck hinterlassen."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Danrok ríe divertido.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, me atrevería a sugerir que quizá el asombro de la estimada canciller se deba a la inusitada muestra de generosidad por parte de un hombre conocido por expresar sus... dudas sobre el conjunto de los Comerciantes Independientes. Parece que le ha causado usted una buena impresión a ese viejo avaro de Macharius».
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok lets out an amused chuckle.{/n} "If I am to venture a guess, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I believe the esteemed chancellor was staggered by such an irregular display of generosity from a man who is rather known for voicing his... doubts in Rogue Traders as a class. It would seem you have made quite an impression on Macharius, the old miser."

traits.locale_text: {n}Danrok ríe divertido.{/n} «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, me atrevería a sugerir que quizá el asombro de la estimada canciller se deba a la inusitada muestra de generosidad por parte de un hombre conocido por expresar su... reticencia a considerar a los Comerciantes Independientes como una casta. Parece que le ha causado usted una buena impresión a ese viejo avaro de Macharius».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Danrok, neşeli bir şekilde gülümsüyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bir tahmin yürütmem gerekirse değerli şansölyeyi böylesine afallatan şey, Hür Tacir sınıfı hakkında duyduğu şüpheleri yüksek sesle dile getirmesiyle bilinen bir adamın böylesi olağan dışı bir cömertlik sergilemiş olması olsa gerek. Cimri ihtiyar Macharius üzerinde büyük bir etki bırakmış olmalısınız."
languages.original_text: {n}Danrok lets out an amused chuckle.{/n} "If I am to venture a guess, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I believe the esteemed chancellor was staggered by such an irregular display of generosity from a man who is rather known for voicing his... doubts in Rogue Traders as a class. It would seem you have made quite an impression on Macharius, the old miser."

Cimri ihtiyar Macharius üzerinde büyük bir etki bırakmış olmalısınız."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
